amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to reduce the number of the following nuclear weapons delivery vehicles of the United States: (1) Heavy bomber aircraft. (2) Air-launched cruise missiles. (3) Nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarines. (4) Submarine-launched ballistic missiles. (5) Intercontinental ballistic missiles.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to reduce the number of the following nuclear weapons delivery vehicles of the United States: (1) Heavy bomber aircraft; (2) Air-launched cruise missiles; (3) Nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarines; (4) Submarine-launched ballistic missiles; and (5) Intercontinetal ballistic missiles.
